scripts.dev: echo Starting development environment... && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:community" "npm run dev:link" "npm run dev:news"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install && cd ../chat-service && npm install && cd ../community-service && npm install && cd ../link-service && npm install && cd ../news-service && npm install
scripts.stop: npm run docker:dev:down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.microservices.yml down
